---
id: 2
title: "Mergers & Acquisitions"
subtitle: Our advisory services with regard to Mergers & Acquisitions involve.
img: "/images/practice-areas/m-and-a.jpg"
imageBlurUrl: "data:image/jpeg;base64,"
url: "#2"
---

Our advisory services with regard to Mergers & Acquisitions involve:
 
  - Market Entry and Incorporation.
  - Guidance on all funding related aspects of a startup.
  - Structuring M&A deals based on client specific business needs and strategy;
  - Advising on Joint Venture strategies.
  - Advisory on Boardroom Strategy.
  - Buy-side and sell-side diligence.
  - Labour and Employee related advisory.
  - Pre and Post Merger Integration strategy.
  - Documentation and Negotiation.
  - Exits Strategy.
  - End to End legal support for newly acquired subsidiaries of Clients
